company.name: OpenAI
company.description: OpenAI是一家领先的人工智能研究公司，专注于开发安全、有益的通用人工智能。公司成立于2015年，总部位于美国旧金山，以开发GPT系列大语言模型和ChatGPT而闻名全球。

projects.name: ChatGPT
projects.description: Advanced conversational AI assistant powered by GPT-4, capable of natural language understanding, code generation, creative writing, and complex reasoning tasks.

projects.name: GPT-4
projects.description: Large multimodal language model capable of processing text and images, with advanced reasoning capabilities and improved accuracy.

projects.name: DALL-E 3
projects.description: Advanced AI image generation model that creates high-quality images from text descriptions with improved accuracy and creativity.

company.name: Anthropic
company.description: Anthropic是一家专注于AI安全的公司，致力于开发有益、无害、诚实的AI系统。公司由OpenAI前研究副总裁创立，以开发Claude AI助手而闻名。

projects.name: Claude
projects.description: Advanced AI assistant designed with constitutional AI principles, featuring enhanced safety, helpfulness, and honesty in conversations and tasks.

company.name: Google
company.description: Google是Alphabet旗下的科技巨头，在人工智能领域投入巨大，开发了Gemini、Bard等AI产品，并在搜索、云计算、自动驾驶等领域广泛应用AI技术。

projects.name: Gemini
projects.description: Google's most advanced AI model with multimodal capabilities, supporting text, image, audio, and video processing with enhanced reasoning and creativity.

projects.name: Google AI Studio
projects.description: Development platform for building and prototyping with Google's AI models, offering easy integration and testing capabilities.

company.name: Microsoft

projects.name: Microsoft Copilot
